name: Flower Cross Stitch
description:
Funky Floral design.

For you to stitch this counted cross-stitch original design, the kit includes:

14 Count White Aida
6-strand cotton thread
Chart
Needle
Instructions

The finished stitched design is 10 x 10 inches.

- Please note the colours on the chart may vary slightly to the yarn colours

Copyright protected by Simply Stitch.

Happy Stitching!
